net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.locale.message
Class MessageBundleScriptCreator

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.locale.message.MessageBundleScriptCreator

public class MessageBundleScriptCreator
extends java.lang.Object

Creates a script which holds the data from a message bundle(s). The script is such that properties can be accessed as functions (i.e.: alert(com.mycompany.mymessage()); ).

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés
